findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected initializer
findings.description: The initializer functions are unprotected and can be called multiple times.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows unlimited token approval without any access control or validation, potentially leading to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential loss of assets.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to increase allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not have any access control or validation checks, allowing anyone to decrease the allowance of an arbitrary user.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is unprotected and can be exploited to mint tokens without restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The internal _burn function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to approve arbitrary amounts.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The internal function _beforeTokenTransfer is unprotected and can be accessed directly, potentially leading to unintended token transfers or other security issues.

findings.title: Unprotected _afterTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _afterTokenTransfer function is not protected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected renounceOwnership function
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function can be called by anyone, allowing an attacker to remove the owner's privileges.

findings.title: Unprotected transferOwnership function
findings.description: The transferOwnership function can be executed by anyone, allowing an attacker to take control of the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected permit function
findings.description: The permit function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap function does not have any protection mechanism, which can lead to potential security risks.
findings.function: swapAndSendToFee, swapAndLiquify, swapTokensForEth, swapTokensForCake, addLiquidity, swapAndSendDividends

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any protection mechanism, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.
